crow.value: select sum(iTotal) from ( select sum(cast(replace(t9,',', '') as float)) as iTotal from YHHZDZDB where year(docdate)=@year and month(docdate)=@emonth and t1 in('当年预算') and t2 in('1-2060199','2-2060199') union all select sum(cast(replace(t2,',', '') as float)) as iTotal from YHHZDZDB where year(docdate)=@year and month(docdate)=@emonth and t1 in('2060199当年直接支付额度') ) a

ccol.value: select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where ccode like '5001%' and citem_id='@prokey' and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

crow.value: select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where (ccode like '500101010101%' or ccode like'50010101010201%' or ccode like '500102010101%' or ccode like '50010201010201%' or ccode like '500103010101%' or ccode like '50010301010201%') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'
select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where (ccode like '5001010102%' or ccode like'5001020102%' or ccode like '5001030102%' ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'
select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where (ccode like '50010101010202%' or ccode like'50010201010202%' or ccode like '50010301010202%' ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

crow.descript: 其中：2014院士科技咨询经费
crow.value: select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where ccode like '5001%' and citem_id in (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where ccode like '5001%' and citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2010 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where ccode like '5001%' and citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2011 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

select sum(md) from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where ccode like '5001%' and citem_id in (SELECT t1 FROM CZZXJDMain WHERE Year(docDate)=2014 and t1 NOT IN (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3')) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate'

ccol.value: select sum(a) from ( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod = @period and citem_id='@prokey' and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' or ccode like '12150203%' ) group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id='@prokey' and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' or ccode like '12150203%') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k

crow.value: select sum(a) from ( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accsum where iperiod=@period and( ccode like '12150303%' or ccode like '12150402' or ccode like '12150202')group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where (ccode like '12150303%' or ccode like '12150402' or ccode like '12150202') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k

select sum(a) from( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod=@period and citem_id in (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3') and (ccode like '121502%' or ccode like '121504%') Union All select (SUM(MD)-SUM(MC)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3')
and (ccode like '121504%' or ccode like '121502%') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate') b

select sum(a) from ( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod = @period and citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2009 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' ) group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2009 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k

select sum(a) from ( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod = @period and citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2010 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' ) group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97sub where citemcode in (select citemcode from @ufdatabase..fitemss97 where citemccode like (select top 1 cast('0' as nvarchar(50)) + cast(@year-2010 as nvarchar(50)) + cast('%' as nvarchar(50)) from ss_project)) ) and (ccode like '12150201%' or ccode like '12150304%' or ccode like '12150401%' ) and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k

select sum(a) from ( select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod = @period and citem_id in (SELECT t1 FROM CZZXJDMain WHERE Year(docDate)=2014 and t1 NOT IN (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3')) and (ccode like '12150304%') group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in (SELECT t1 FROM CZZXJDMain WHERE Year(docDate)=2014 and t1 NOT IN (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3') ) and (ccode like '12150304%') and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k

)t

crow.value: select isnull(sum(a),0) from ( select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3') and ccode like '5001%' and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' union all select sum(mb) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accmultiass where iperiod=@period and citem_id in (select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3')and ccode like '12150201%' group by mb union all select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) as a from @ufdatabase..gl_accvouch where citem_id in ( select t1 from [baoth_newp].dbo.czzxjdmain where SubString(t1,0,5)='2014' or t1='2012xz1-3') and ccode like '12150201%' and dbill_date >= '@sdate' and dbill_date <= '@edate' ) k
